member.name: T:IronPdf.PdfCompleteExtensions
member.summary: Extension Methods made possible by combining IronOcr and IronPDF together.

member.name: M:IronPdf.PdfCompleteExtensions.PdfOcr(IronPdf.HtmlToPdf,System.String)
member.summary:
Performs basic , automated OCR on a PDf document, even a raw scan. Returns barcodes and texts.
Also see for advanced PDF OCR Option.s
member.param: File path to a PDF file.
member.returns: A structured result containing text, images and barcodes

member.name: T:IronSoftware.PdfComplete.PdfComplete
member.summary: Licensing and shortcut methods for using the Suite of Iron PDF related packages together.

member.name: T:IronSoftware.PdfComplete.PdfComplete.License
member.summary: Allows IronPdf & IronOcr license keys to be applied globally across an entire application or website

member.name: P:IronSoftware.PdfComplete.PdfComplete.License.PdfLicenseKey
member.summary: Get Licensed at http://ironpdf.com/license?complete A License key can also be added to Web.Config or App.Config as IronPdf.LicenseKey

member.name: P:IronSoftware.PdfComplete.PdfComplete.License.OcrLicenseKey
member.summary: Get Licensed at http://iron.com/license?complete or file:///Users/jacob/Sites/ironsoftware.com/csharp/ocr/licensing/index.html A License key can also be added to Web.Config or App.Config as IronOcr.LicenseKey
